verses.verse: And Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> unto all Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H8085><s%>, Hear, O Israel <S%H3478><s%>, the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and the ordinances <S%H4941><s%> which I speak <S%H1696><s%> in your ears <S%H241><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%>, that ye may learn <S%H3925><s%> them <S%H8104><s%>, and observe to do them <S%H6213><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with us in Horeb <S%H2722><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> not this covenant <S%H1285><s%> with our fathers <S%H1><s%>, but with us <S%H587><s%>, even us <S%H587><s%>, who are all of us here alive <S%H2416><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> with you face <S%H6440><s%> to face <S%H6440><s%> in the mount <S%H2022><s%> out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%>,

(I stood <S%H5975><s%> between Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> and you at that time <S%H6256><s%>, to show <S%H5046><s%> you the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: for ye were afraid <S%H3372><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%>, and went not up <S%H5927><s%> into the mount <S%H2022><s%>;) saying <S%H559><s%>,
I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, who brought thee out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage <S%H5650><s%>.
Thou shalt have no other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> before me <S%H6440><s%>.

Thou shalt not make <S%H6213><s%> unto thee a graven image <S%H6459><s%>, nor any likeness <S%H8544><s%> of anything that is in heaven <S%H8064><s%> above <S%H4605><s%>, or that is in the earth <S%H776><s%> beneath <S%H4325><s%>, or that is in the water under the earth <S%H776><s%>:

thou shalt not bow down <S%H7812><s%> thyself unto them <S%H5647><s%>, nor serve them <S%H3068><s%>; for I, Jehovah, thy God <S%H430><s%>, am a jealous <S%H7067><s%> God <S%H430><s%>, visiting <S%H6485><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> upon the children <S%H1121><s%>, and upon the third <S%H8029><s%> and upon the fourth <S%H7256><s%> generation of them that hate me <S%H8130><s%>;
and showing <S%H6213><s%> lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> unto thousands <S%H505><s%> of them that love <S%H157><s%> me and keep <S%H8104><s%> my commandments <S%H4687><s%>.

Thou shalt not take <S%H5375><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> in vain <S%H7723><s%>: for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will not hold him guiltless <S%H5352><s%> that taketh <S%H5375><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> in vain <S%H7723><s%>.
Observe <S%H8104><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, to keep <S%H8104><s%> it holy <S%H3068><s%>, as Jehovah thy God <S%H430><s%> commanded thee <S%H6680><s%>.
Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shalt thou labor <S%H5647><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> all thy work <S%H4399><s%>;

but the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> is a sabbath <S%H7676><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>: in it thou shalt not do <S%H6213><s%> any work <S%H4399><s%>, thou <S%H1121><s%>, nor thy son, nor thy daughter <S%H1323><s%>, nor thy man-servant <S%H5650><s%>, nor thy maid-servant <S%H519><s%>, nor thine ox <S%H7794><s%>, nor thine ass <S%H2543><s%>, nor any of thy cattle <S%H929><s%>, nor thy stranger <S%H1616><s%> that is within thy gates <S%H8179><s%>; that thy man-servant <S%H5650><s%> and thy maid-servant <S%H519><s%> may rest as well as thou <S%H5117><s%>.

And thou shalt remember <S%H2142><s%> that thou wast a servant <S%H5650><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> thee out thence by a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> and by an outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>: therefore Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> thee to keep <S%H6213><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

Honor <S%H3513><s%> thy father <S%H1><s%> and thy mother <S%H517><s%>, as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> thee <S%H3117><s%>; that thy days may be long <S%H748><s%>, and that it may go well <S%H3190><s%> with thee <S%H127><s%>, in the land which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth thee <S%H5414><s%>.
Thou shalt not kill <S%H7523><s%>.
Neither shalt thou commit adultery <S%H5003><s%>.
Neither shalt thou steal <S%H1589><s%>.
Neither shalt thou bear <S%H6030><s%> false <S%H7723><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> against thy neighbor <S%H7453><s%>.

Neither shalt thou covet <S%H2530><s%> thy neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%>; neither shalt thou desire <S%H183><s%> thy neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>, his field <S%H7704><s%>, or his man-servant <S%H5650><s%>, or his maid-servant <S%H519><s%>, his ox <S%H7794><s%>, or his ass <S%H2543><s%>, or anything that is thy neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s.

These words <S%H1697><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto all your assembly <S%H6951><s%> in the mount <S%H2022><s%> out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%>, of the cloud <S%H6051><s%>, and of the thick darkness <S%H6205><s%>, with a great <S%H1419><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%>: and he added no more <S%H3254><s%>. And he wrote <S%H3789><s%> them upon two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%>, and gave them unto me <S%H5414><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H8085><s%>, when ye heard the voice <S%H6963><s%> out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the darkness <S%H2822><s%>, while the mountain <S%H2022><s%> was burning <S%H1197><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>, that ye came near <S%H7126><s%> unto me <S%H7218><s%>, even all the heads of your tribes <S%H7626><s%>, and your elders <S%H2205><s%>;

and ye said <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah our God <S%H430><s%> hath showed <S%H7200><s%> us his glory <S%H3519><s%> and his greatness <S%H1433><s%>, and we have heard <S%H8085><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%> out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%>: we have seen <S%H7200><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> doth speak <S%H1696><s%> with man <S%H120><s%>, and he liveth <S%H2425><s%>.

Now therefore why should we die <S%H4191><s%>? for this great <S%H1419><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> will consume <S%H398><s%> us <S%H8085><s%>: if we hear the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> any more <S%H3254><s%>, then we shall die <S%H4191><s%>.

For who is there of all flesh <S%H1320><s%>, that hath heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%> God <S%H430><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%> out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%>, as we have <S%H2421><s%>, and lived?

Go thou near <S%H7126><s%>, and hear <S%H8085><s%> all that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%>: and speak <S%H559><s%> thou unto us all that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> unto thee <S%H8085><s%>; and we will hear it <S%H6213><s%>, and do it.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of your words <S%H1697><s%>, when ye spake <S%H1696><s%> unto me <S%H3068><s%>; and Jehovah said <S%H1696><s%> unto me <S%H8085><s%>, I have heard the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the words <S%H1697><s%> of this people <S%H5971><s%>, which they have spoken <S%H1696><s%> unto thee <S%H3190><s%>: they have well said all that they have spoken <S%H1696><s%>.

Oh that there were such <S%H2088><s%> a <S%H4310><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%> in them <S%H5414><s%>, that they would fear <S%H3372><s%> me <S%H8104><s%>, and keep all my commandments <S%H4687><s%> always <S%H3117><s%>, that it might be well <S%H3190><s%> with them <S%H1121><s%>, and with their children for ever <S%H5769><s%>!
Go <S%H3212><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to them <S%H7725><s%>, Return ye to your tents <S%H168><s%>.

But as for thee <S%H5975><s%>, stand thou here by me <S%H5978><s%>, and I will speak <S%H1696><s%> unto thee all the commandment <S%H4687><s%>, and the statutes <S%H2706><s%>, and the ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, which thou shalt teach <S%H3925><s%> them <S%H6213><s%>, that they may do them in the land <S%H776><s%> which I give <S%H5414><s%> them to possess it <S%H3423><s%>.

Ye shall observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> therefore as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> you <S%H5493><s%>: ye shall not turn aside to the right hand <S%H3225><s%> or to the left <S%H8040><s%>.

Ye shall walk <S%H3212><s%> in all the way <S%H1870><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> you <S%H2421><s%>, that ye may live, and that it may be well <S%H2895><s%> with you <S%H748><s%>, and that ye may prolong your days <S%H3117><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> which ye shall possess <S%H3423><s%>.
